data.title: The Drowned World and The Wind from Nowhere
data.meta_description: Garden City: Doubleday, 1965. Book Club Edition. Hardcover. pp. 316. 8vo. Bound in black cloth with gilt lettering to spine. General shelfwear, slant to spine. Dustjacket shelfworn, with some nicking and tearing to edges, now in plastic brodart sleeve; very good in good dustjacket. Item #090912
